client_id = #{clientId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
order_market_type = #{orderMarketType},

type = #{type},

product_id = #{productId},
product_name = #{productName},
product_price = #{productPrice},
product_vip_price = #{productVipPrice},
org_normal_price_market = #{orgNormalPriceMarket},
org_normal_price_count = #{orgNormalPriceCount},
normal_price_market = #{normalPriceMarket},

org_vip_price_market = #{orgVipPriceMarket},

vip_price_market = #{vipPriceMarket},
vip_price_count = #{vipPriceCount},
ticket_id = #{ticketId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE cb_active_order_detail
client_id = #{clientId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
order_market_type = #{orderMarketType},
active_id = #{activeId},
type = #{type},
sub_order_id = #{subOrderId},

product_price = #{productPrice},

org_normal_price_count = #{orgNormalPriceCount},

normal_price_count = normal_price_count- #{normalPriceCount},

WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE cb_active_order_detail

normal_price_count = normal_price_count+ #{normalPriceCount},

WHERE id = #{id}
